item.description:
• DECEMBER VegWorcester General Interest Meeting
  • This will be our 7th general meeting and its is open for current members and new members, volunteers, or people who are just curious to find out what VegWorcester is all about!  If you haven't attended before, don't be shy, come on out and tell us about why you went veg and what types of things you'd like to see us do in Worcester, etc.
  • We'll do a go-around and introduce ourselves and get to know eachother, and we will talk about what we've been up to as a group this fall. We'll also talk about upcoming winter outreach, vegan holiday meals, and our upcoming movie showing at Worcester State College which will be in January. We'll have some events volunteers can sign up for as well.
  • We'll also do a small casual vegan potluck if anyone wants to bring something...  remember that all ingredients should be vegan (no meat, milk, dairy, eggs, gelatin, etc) and you should bring plates/utensils if needed. But don't worry if you can't bring anything, just feel free to show up!

 

  • There is also a Facebook Event for this: https://www.facebook.com/event.php?eid=300586556635232

For more info:

  • manda@vegworcester.com
  • http://www.vegworcester.com    
  • http://www.facebook.com/vegworcester
item.how_to_find_us: Park on the street, 950 Main St. (3rd Floor - Room: Atwood 301)
item.name: VegWorcester December General Meeting
